name: Premiere Tree Services of Huntsville
tag_list: tree, tree-service, tree-care, tree-removal, tree-trimming, tree-pruning, tree-planting, land-clearing, stump-grinding, shrub-removal, tree-spraying, emergency-services, debris-hauling, landscaping, kudzu-removal, garden, shrub
overview:
Premiere Tree Services of Huntsville is a complete tree service provider for more than 20 years. We’ve been providing professional tree care services to municipal, residential and commercial clients throughout the greater Huntsville, and our service area includes Birmingham, Adamsville, Decatur, Dothan and surrounding areas.

Some of our most favorite tree services are: tree removal, land clearing, tree planting, stump grinding, tree spraying, tree pruning & trimming, landscaping and even shrub removal. We also have a 24-Hour Emergency Tree Service to meet your emergency needs!

Contact us to schedule your FREE On-Site Estimates in any of our tree services based in what you need.

Premiere Tree Services of Huntsville 6275 University Dr. NW Ste. 37-250 Huntsville AL 35806 Phone: 256-715-6722 Email: huntsville@premieretreeservices.com Website: http://huntsville.premieretreeservices.com/

To read more about tree care and services, visit our blog page TREE LOVERS for more information. Blog: http://treelovers.premieretreeservices.com/ RSS Feed: http://treelovers.premieretreeservices.com/feed/
